title: 2) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 15 of 2023)), hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Forms)
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Forms) 

Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 11 June 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited company act 2014 (forms) regulation 2023 (2) regulation shall come operation 11 june 2023

title: 2) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 15 of 2023)), hereby make the following regulations:

text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, Regulations of 2015 means the Companies Act 

2014 (Forms) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 147 of 2015).

title: 2) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 15 of 2023)), hereby make the following regulations:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to prescribe amended forms for the purposes 
of sections 22(2), 149(8), 149(9), 152(3) and 343(4) of the Companies Act 2014. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [295] 31
